channel.title: Mohammad Sabik Irbaz
channel.description: Recent content on Mohammad Sabik Irbaz

item.title: Bio
item.description: Assalamu Alaikum (May peace be upon you), I am Mohammad Sabik Irbaz, born and raised in Bangladesh, near the longest sea-beach in the world, Cox’s Bazar. You can call me Sabik. I am a student of knowledge and an independent Natural Language Processing researcher. Currently I am working as a Lead Machine Learning Engineer at Pioneer Alpha Ltd. I am also serving as the main instructor of Applied Data Science and Machine Learning course at Amar iSchool, an online educational platform.
